Creating a game

Click on the \'Create Game\' button from the main menu
Choose a name for your game
Confirm your choices by pressing the \'Create Game\' button
After being transferred to the game lobby, you\'ll see a code at the top off the screen.
Share this code with the people you want to play with.
Click on the \'Join Game\' button from the main menu
Input the game code you got from the host of the game you want to join
Join the game by pressing the \'Join Game\' button
Wait for all player slots to be filled to start the game
Each round, players will be assigned as drawers or guessers

If you\'re a drawer, choose a word or phrase to draw from three options, each with different difficulty levels (easy, medium, hard). Drawers earn points each time a guesser guesses correctly, with harder words earning more points. A countdown from 3 will signal the start of the round after the word is chosen.
During the round, each player gets one turn to draw
Use the pencil and eraser to draw if you\'re the drawer
Guessers input their guesses in a text field to guess the word being drawn. Guessers earn more points the earlier they guess correctly in the turn
Each turn lasts for 1 minute, displayed at the top of the screen
After a turn, players are directed back to their roles (drawer or guesser) for the next round
After all players have drawn once, a high score list displays ranking each player by points
After 5 seconds, the next round automatically begins
After three rounds, the player with the most points is declared the winner
